meanings.definition: The quality or state of being regenerated.
meanings.sent1: The regeneracies of the forest after the fire were truly remarkable.
meanings.sent2: The regeneracies of the soil were evident after the heavy rainfall.
meanings.sent3: The regeneracies of the garden made the flowers bloom beautifully.
meanings.sent4: Her kindness had the regeneracies of bringing people together like a warm hug.
meanings.sent5: The regeneracies of the sunrise painted the sky in vibrant colors.

meanings.definition: The act or process of regenerating.
meanings.sent1: The regeneracies of the machine were fascinating to watch.
meanings.sent2: The regeneracies of the city involved rebuilding many structures.
meanings.sent3: The regeneracies of the clockwork toy made it seem alive.
meanings.sent4: The regeneracies of the river flowing endlessly reminded him of life's cycle.
meanings.sent5: The regeneracies of the plant growing from a seed were a marvel to witness.

meanings.sent1: The regeneracies of the patient's health were a relief to the doctor.
meanings.sent2: The regeneracies of the community brought hope for a better future.
meanings.sent3: The regeneracies of the old building gave it a new lease on life.
meanings.sent4: The regeneracies of the team's spirit led them to victory.
meanings.sent5: The regeneracies of the forest created a peaceful atmosphere.
